io.micronaut.http.bind.binders

Interface AnnotatedRequestArgumentBinder<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - An annotation
    T - A type
    All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotatedArgumentBinder<A,T,HttpRequest<?>>, ArgumentBinder<T,HttpRequest<?>>, RequestArgumentBinder<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BodyArgumentBinder<T>, NonBlockingBodyArgumentBinder<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompletableFutureBodyBinder, CookieAnnotationBinder, DefaultBodyAnnotationBinder, HeaderAnnotationBinder, MaybeBodyBinder, MultipartBodyArgumentBinder, ObservableBodyBinder, OptionalSessionValueArgumentBinder, ParameterAnnotationBinder, PathVariableAnnotationBinder, PublisherBodyBinder, QueryValueArgumentBinder, RequestAttributeAnnotationBinder, RequestBeanAnnotationBinder, SessionValueArgumentBinder, SingleBodyBinder

    public interface AnnotatedRequestArgumentBinder<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation,T>
extends RequestArgumentBinder<T>, AnnotatedArgumentBinder<A,T,HttpRequest<?>>
    An interface for classes that bind an Argument from an HttpRequest driven by an annotation.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
    See Also:
    CookieAnnotationBinder, ParameterAnnotationBinder, HeaderAnnotationBinder, RequestAttributeAnnotationBinder
